data.lyric:
[ti:Knockin' Boots]
[ar:Luke Bryan]
[al:Knockin' Boots]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Knockin' Boots - Luke Bryan
[00:01.18]This truck needs a half tank
[00:04.47]These wheels need a two-lane
[00:08.10]This radio needs three songs to play
[00:12.08]To get me 'cross town to you
[00:15.38]That dress needs to slip off
[00:18.99]That hair needs to come down
[00:22.51]Friday nights need to do
[00:24.76]What Friday nights need to do
[00:28.35]That's the truth
[00:30.01]Yeah birds need bees and ice needs whiskey
[00:34.01]Boys like me need the girls like you to kiss me
[00:37.36]'Fishin' in the Dark' needs Nitty Gritty
[00:41.32]Under that pale moon
[00:44.98]Sweet tea needs that sugar stirrin'
[00:48.63]Small town nights need both ends burnin'
[00:52.18]Shades need drawin' hearts need fallin'
[00:55.92]Boots need knockin' knockin' boots
[01:02.55]Knockin' boots me and you oh
[01:13.72]Long weeks need a weekend
[01:17.14]Cheap drinks need a-slingin'
[01:20.79]That dance floor needs some me on you
[01:25.00]And you want me tonight
[01:28.04]Singalongs need to be sung
[01:31.61]Tip bells need to be rung
[01:35.73]Last calls need a call that cab
[01:39.06]And backseats need I want you so bad
[01:42.66]Yeah birds need bees and ice needs whiskey
[01:46.66]Boys like me need the girls like you to kiss me
[01:50.29]'Fishin' in the Dark' needs Nitty Gritty
[01:54.03]Under that pale moon
[01:57.77]Sweet tea needs that sugar stirrin'
[02:01.36]Small town nights need both ends burnin'
[02:04.91]Shades need drawin' hearts need fallin'
[02:08.64]Boots need knockin' knockin' boots
[02:15.36]Knockin' boots girl me and you
[02:26.78]Doors need shuttin'
[02:28.61]Lights need cuttin'
[02:30.37]Lips need lockin'
[02:32.14]Boots need knockin'
[02:33.72]And birds need bees and ice needs whiskey
[02:37.55]Boys like me need the girls like you to kiss me
[02:41.29]'Fishin' in the Dark' needs Nitty Gritty
[02:45.02]Under that pale moon
[02:48.57]Sweet tea needs that sugar stirrin'
[02:52.12]Small town nights need both ends burnin'
[02:55.74]Shades need drawin' hearts need fallin'
[02:59.37]Boots need knockin' knockin' boots
[03:05.80]Mmm knockin' boots me and you oh
[03:17.24]Knockin' boots
data.trans:
[ti:Knockin' Boots]
[ar:Luke Bryan]
[al:Knockin' Boots]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.18]卡车需要加半箱油
[00:04.47]车轮需要一条双车道
[00:08.10]收音机需要播放三首歌
[00:12.08]我才能去到城市的另一边找你
[00:15.38]裙子从身上滑落
[00:18.99]头发披散在肩上
[00:22.51]周五晚上就是要这样
[00:24.76]周五晚上就是要这样
[00:28.35]这是事实
[00:30.01]鸟儿与蜜蜂为伴 威士忌搭配冰块
[00:34.01]我很需要你的吻
[00:37.36]The Nitty Gritty Dirt Band创作出歌曲《Fishin' in the Dark》
[00:41.32]黯淡的月光下
[00:44.98]方糖加进奶茶中 轻轻搅拌
[00:48.63]小镇的夜晚 一刻也不曾安静
[00:52.18]暗影慢慢投下 心渐渐沉醉
[00:55.92]脚步凌乱 鞋子踢踢踏踏
[01:02.55]我们的脚步声混杂在一起
[01:13.72]漫长的一周过去 终于迎来周末
[01:17.14]廉价的饮料里加点料
[01:20.79]我们在舞池里 身体紧紧贴在一起
[01:25.00]今晚 你渴望得到我
[01:28.04]歌唱聚会就要大声唱歌
[01:31.61]摁响门铃
[01:35.73]最后打电话叫辆出租车
[01:39.06]坐在后座的我很想你
[01:42.66]鸟儿与蜜蜂为伴 威士忌搭配冰块
[01:46.66]我很需要你的吻
